casebody.data:
Carl Wesley SCOTT v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 6396. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. June 4, 1960. Stephen E. Connor, Denver, Colo., for appellant. Paul W. Cress, U. S. Atty., and Erwin A. Cook, Asst. U. S. Atty., Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, PICKETT and LEWIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
